skills.text: When this card attacks a Leader Card, draw 1 card.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, and flip this card over.
During your turn, if your opponent has no Battle Cards in their Battle Area, this card gains +5000 power and **Double Strike**
When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Then, if your opponent has 2 or less Battle Cards, this card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
